RPGUI.SETTINGS.DORAKOUI: Hello Hello, you've just activated Pathfinder Ui v3 & Dorako Ui at the same time. Both modules are graphical interfaces and cannot be activated together, as they share common code that interferes with each other. Please deactivate one of the two interfaces. Thank you for your understanding.
RPGUI.SETTINGS.DARKPARTYSHEET_HINT: Ermöglicht die Auswahl zwischen dem Original- und dem Dunkelblatt.
RPGUI.SETTINGS.DARKJOURNAL_HINT: Select original, custom or dark custom sheet.
RPGUI.SETTINGS.TOKEN_EFFECT_HUD_HINT: Makes effects circular and arranges them outside the token, or on the token ring for larger tokens
RPGUI.SETTINGS.TOKEN_HUD: Disable Dark PF2e Interactive Token Tooltip?
RPGUI.SETTINGS.TOKEN_HUD_HINT: Disables the dark theme of PF2e Interactive Token Tooltip and restores default theme
RPGUI.SETTINGS.PF2E_HUD_HINT: Disable PF2e HUD theme and restores default theme
RPGUI.SETTINGS.PF2E_BESTIARY_TRACKING_HI: Disable PF2e Bestiary Tracking theme and restores default theme
RPGUI.SETTINGS.NAVIGATION: Schalte die Navigation zurück in den horizontalen Modus
RPGUI.SETTINGS.NAVIGATION_HINT: Verwende diesen Schalter, wenn du die Combat Carousel-Integration nicht verwendest
RPGUI.SETTINGS.COMPACT_MODE_HINT: Verkleinert das linke Menü und entfernt das Logo
RPGUI.SETTINGS.STANDARD_LOGO_HINT: Zurück zum Standardlogo anstelle des Textlogos
RPGUI.SETTINGS.JOURNAL_SHEET: Disable parchment texture on Journal pages
RPGUI.SETTINGS.JOURNAL_SHEET_HINT: Disable the parchment appearance on journal entries.
RPGUI.SETTINGS.JOURNAL_CURSOR_HINT: Disable RPG Cursor style in Interface.
RPGUI.SETTINGS.MINIMAL_UI_HINT: Behebt einige (nicht alle) Probleme mit dem minimalen UI
RPGUI.SETTINGS.DISABLE_STYLES_HINT: Dies ist eine lokale Einstellung, mit der jeder Spieler Stile deaktivieren kann
RPGUI.SETTINGS.EnableAllianceViewerTitle: Show the actor's alliance in the SideBar
RPGUI.SETTINGS.EnableAllianceViewerHint: Displays a colored dot allowing you to easily see the alliance to which an actor belongs
